prefix.set: You have updated the prefix to `{{prefix}}`.

roles.set: You have set the role channel to {{- channel}}.
roles.noRole: I couldn't find a role with that name.
roles.added: You have added the {{role}} role to user roles.
roles.removed: You have removed the {{role}} role from the user roles.
roles.notSet: You do not have a role channel set.
roles.notFound: I couldn't locate the currently set role channel.

legacy.enabled: You have enabled the legacy roles system.
legacy.disabled: You have disabled the legacy roles system.
legacy.rebuild: You cannot do this while legacy roles are enabled.

embed.content: If you want the {{- role}} role, react below!

roles.list: You have the following roles assignable by users: {{list}}

help.sent: I've sent you a DM with all the commands!
help.nodm: I couldn't send you a DM! Do you have DMs disabled for this server?!
help.notfound: That is not a valid command.

botlogs.enable: You have enabled the bot logs system.
botlogs.disable: You have disabled the bot logs system.
botlogs.nochannel: You do not have a bot logs channel set.
botlogs.set: You have set the bot logs channel to {{- channel}}.
botlogs.notfound: You did not mention a channel or it couldn't be found in this server.

role.notEnabled: The legacy role assignment system is not enabled on this server.
role.notAssignable: You cannot assign that role to yourself or it doesn't exist.

none.self: You do not have a profile available, try talking first.
none.other: {{user}} does not have a profile available.

welcome.set: I have set the channel {{- channel}} as the join/leave channels.

set.welcome: I have automatically found the {{- channel}} channel and configured it for join and leave messages.
set.system: I have automatically found the {{- channel}} channel and configured it for join and leave messages. You should diable the welcome messages in Discord's UI as I don't have permission to change this.

auto.error: I couldn't determine a channel to auto-configure. Please setup manually by using `{{prefix}}welcome channel #mention`

punishments.noHistory: The user has not been punished on this server.
punishments.notWarned: This user has not been warned on this server.
punishments.notKicked: This user has not been kicked on this server.
punishments.notBanned: This user has not been banned on this server.
punishments.tooManyPunishments: This user has too many punishments to display at once, please narrow by type of punishment.

expunged.noid: I couldn't find a punishment by that id or it wasn't provided.

prune.notNumeric: You need to provide a valid number.
prune.notInRange: You need to provide a number between 2 and 99.
prune.pruned: {{amount}} messages have been pruned from this channel.

warn.noReason: You must provide a reason with this punishment.
warn.higher: You cannot warn someone higher than or equal to you.

kick.higher: You cannot kick someone higher than or equal to you.

ban.higher: You cannot ban someone higher than or equal to you.

hug.self: **{{target}}** you were hugged by {{bot}}, cause nobody else would.

duel.self: You can't duel yourself by definition.

swapi.notValidType: Sorry, that is not a valid type, the valid options are: {{options}}.
swapi.noResults: Sorry, I couldn't find any results.

8ball.question: You need to ask the magic 8ball a question!

leveling.enabled: You have enabled the leveling system for this server.
leveling.disabled: You have disabled the leveling system for this server.

language.fr: You have set the language to French.
language.en: You have set the language to English.
language.de: You have set the language to German.

bodies.upcoming: Maintenance begins in {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes.
bodies.in_progress: Maintenance ends in {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes.
bodies.past: Maintenance concluded {{days}} days, {{hours}} hours, and {{minutes}} minutes ago.

maintenance.unavailable: There is currently no maintenance schedule available.
maintenance.connection: There was a problem trying to reach SWTORdata.com.

commands.noexp: You have set your exp gain to {{condition}}.

errors.runtime: There was an error during the running of this command.
errors.nouser: There was a problem trying to load that user.
errors.noPermission: You do not have the permission to use this command.
